snippet: A 10-point lead for President Obama in a Pew Research poll is impressive on the surface, but in context, it doesn't tell us anything all that different.
abstract: A 10-point lead for President Obama in a Pew Research poll is impressive on the surface, but in context, it doesn't tell us anything all that different.

headline.main: Aug. 2: When a Poll That Seems Like News Isn't
